context:
Indian Television Academy Awards
Year | Actor | Show
--- | --- | ---
2003 | Simi Garewal | Rendezvous with Simi Garewal
2004 | Barkha Dutt | We The People
2005 | Prabhu Chawla | Seedhi Baat
2006 | Lola Kutty Barkha Dutt | Lola TV We The People
2007 | Karan Johar | Koffee with Karan
2008 | Vikram Chandra | The Big Fight
2009 | Rajdeep Sardesai Kiran Bedi | Battle For India Aap Ki Kachehri
2010 | Amitabh Bachchan | Bigg Boss 3
2011 | Koel Purie | On the Couch with Koel
2012 | Sumeet Raghavan | Jay Hind !
2013 | Amitabh Bachchan | Kaun Banega Crorepati

wiki_section_title: Categories -- Other Awards

wiki_section_text: 

intro: The Indian Television Academy Awards, also known as the ITA Awards, is an annual event organised by the Indian Television Academy to honour excellence of Indian Television.

qa.question: What is the Indian Academy Award-winning show whose actor was born on 17 October 1947 ?
